thread.title: French Ice-Dance Couple Toughs Out Costume Malfunction; Canadians Overtake

author: Louise Radnofsky
title: French Ice-Dance Couple Toughs Out Costume Malfunction; Canadians Overtake
text:
GANGNEUNG, South Korea—Canada’s Tessa Virtue and Scott Moir led over French ice-dance gold-medal rivals Gabriella Papadakis and Gillaume Cizeron, while Madison Hubbell and Zachary Donohue held the skinniest of edges over fellow Americans Maia and Alex Shibutani in the contest for bronze after the short dance here.
Papadakis and Cizeron were hobbled by a costume malfunction that left them visibly distressed and almost two points behind 2010 Olympic champions and 2014 silver medalists Virtue and Moir. Both couples have strong...
